languages.text: {n}Собрав волю в кулак, вы мысленно отталкиваете удушье, грозящее свалить вас с ног... и кольцо вокруг горла с едва уловимым звоном распадается. Путеводная нить голоса Кибеллы ярко сияет в вашем сознании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Собрав волю в кулак, вы мысленно отталкиваете удушье, грозящее свалить вас с ног... и кольцо вокруг вашего горла с едва уловимым звоном распадается. Путеводная нить голоса Кибеллы ярко сияет в вашем сознании.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Собрав волю в кулак, вы мысленно отталкиваете удушье, грозящее свалить вас с ног... и кольцо вокруг горла с едва уловимым звоном распадается. Путеводная нить голоса Кибеллы ярко сияет в вашем сознании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it bring you down on your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat unfastens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

{n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it bring you down on your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat unfastens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

{n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

{n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

{n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

{n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kanalisierst deine Willenskraft, um das Erstickungsgefühl wegzuschieben, dich davon nicht auf die Knie zwingen zu lassen ... und du hörst fast das Klirren von Metall, als sich das Halsband um deine Kehle endlich löst. Der leitende Faden von Kibellahs Stimme leuchtet in deinem Verstand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kanalisierst deine Willenskraft, um das Erstickungsgefühl wegzuschieben, dich davon nicht auf die Knie zwingen zu lassen ... und du hörst fast das Klirren von Metall, als sich das Halsband um deine Kehle endlich löst. Der leitende Faden von Kibellahs Stimme leuchtet in deinem Verstand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Canalizas tu fuerza de voluntad para apartar la sensación de asfixia, negándote a permitir que te doblegue... y casi puedes oír el tintineo del metal mientras el collar que te atenaza se afloja. El hilo guía de la voz de Kibellah brilla en tu mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Canalizas tu fuerza de voluntad para apartar la sensación de asfixia, negándote a permitir que te doblegue... y casi puedes oír el tintineo del metal mientras el collar que te atenaza se afloja. El hilo guía de la voz de Kibellah brilla en tu mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは意思の力を振り絞って息苦しさを押しのけ、非ざまづかせようとする力を拒む…すると喉を締め付ける首輪がようやく緩み、金属音が聞こえたような気がした。キベラの声の導きの糸が、あなたの心の中で輝いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは意思の力を振り絞って息苦しさを押しのけ、非ざまづかせようとする力を拒む…すると喉を締め付ける首輪がようやく緩み、金属音が聞こえたような気がした。キベラの声の導きの糸が、あなたの心の中で輝いていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你凝聚起着意志，努力与窒息的感觉抗争，拒绝它的胁迫……当你脖子上的钢夹终于松开时，你感觉几乎听到了金属的叮当声。绮贝菈的声音仿佛丝线一般，在你的脑海中闪烁，指引着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你凝聚起着意志，努力与窒息的感觉抗争，拒绝它的胁迫……当你脖子上的钢夹终于松开时，你感觉几乎听到了金属的叮当声。绮贝菈的声音仿佛丝线一般，在你的脑海中闪烁，指引着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous canalisez toute votre volonté pour repousser cette sensation de suffoquer qui cherche à vous mettre à genoux... et vous pouvez presque entendre le tintement du métal lorsqu'enfin, le collier d'acier se desserre. La voix de Kibellah, véritable fil conducteur, brille désormais dans votre esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous canalisez toute votre volonté pour repousser cette sensation de suffoquer qui cherche à vous mettre à genoux... et vous pouvez presque entendre le tintement du métal lorsqu'enfin, le collier d'acier se desserre. La voix de Kibellah, véritable fil conducteur, brille désormais dans votre esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İradenin kuvvetini, boğulma hissini bir kenara atmaya yönlendiriyorsun. Sana boyun eğdirmesine izin vermiyorsun. Boğazının etrafını saran tasma en nihayetinde gevşerken metalin çınlayışını duyar gibisin. Kibellah'nın sesiyle örülmüş kılavuz ipliği, zihninde parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You channel your force of will to push the suffocation aside, refusing to let it force you to your knees... and you can almost hear the ringing of metal as the collar around your throat finally loosens. The guiding thread of Kibellah's voice shines on in your mind.{/n}
